meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Megan Clair Emily Hollins Jon Groubert Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7541.

td.p: Megan Clair, a senior risk analyst from Houston, Texas
Emily Hollins, a university registrar from Hancock, Maryland
Jon Groubert, a former attorney from Denver, Colorado (whose 2-day cash winnings total $40,991)

tr.td: WHAT'S THAT PLANET?
TV FUNNY GUYS
THE CLASSICS
A ROCKY CATEGORY
ORANGES
THE NEW "BLACK"
